intro: Vellozia scabra, commonly known as the rough vellozia, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Restionaceae and is characterized by its unique, grass-like appearance with narrow, linear leaves. The plant produces small, clustered flowers that are typically pink or white in color. Vellozia scabra is often found in sandy or rocky soils in coastal areas. It is adapted to withstand harsh environmental conditions, including high temperatures and limited water availability.
